properties.areaDesc: Harrison, TX; Panola, TX; Rusk, TX; Gregg, TX
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:00AM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* FLOOD WARNING FOR
the Sabine River Near Beckville, Texas.
* from Thursday afternoon to Monday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7:45 AM Wednesday The stage was 16.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 26 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Thursday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 27.9 feet by Saturday morning.  The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday morning.
* Impact...Expect considerable lowland flooding similar to that of
last year, during the springtime of 2019.  Expect flooded trails,
paths, and secondary roadways.  Also expect flooded boat ramps.
Secure boats for high water.  Also secure petroleum installations
for high water as well.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive vehicles through flooded waterways.  Use caution when
walking near flooded riverbanks.  Do not try to wade or swim in
flooded rivers and bayous.

For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website
address into your favorite web browser URL bar:
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv
